720p30veryfast.description: 720p video @ 30 FPS, 3 Mbit per second. Good for reliable quality at lower bitrate, decent on i5 processors.

720p30fast.description: 720p video @ 30 FPS, 3 Mbit per second.  Higher quality than your average game stream, recommend i7 processor.

720p60veryfast.description: 720p video @ 60 FPS, 4 Mbit per second.  Good for high framerate (classic console, FPS, etc) content, recommend i7 processor

720p60fast.description: 720p video @ 60 FPS, 4 Mbit per second.  Great for high framerate (classic console, FPS, etc) content, recommend dedicated i7 Processor

1080p30veryfast.description: 1080p Video @ 30 FPS, 4 Mbit per second. Good for high detail content, okay on i5 processors, recommend i7.

1080p30fast.description: 1080p Video @ 30 FPS, 4 Mbit per second.  Great for high detail content, recommend dedicated i7 processor.

1080p60veryfast.description: 1080p Video @ 60 FPS, 5 Mbit per second.  For high detail, high framreate (classic console, FPS, etc) content. Recommend dedicated i7 processor.

1080p60fast.description: 1080p Video @ 60 FPS, 5 Mbit per second.  Excellent quality for high framerate content, recommend dedicated i7 processor.
